name: function-wars
description: Back-end for ELTE IK thesis project.

scripts.dev: nodemon -e ts,js --ignore dist  --exec npm run compile
scripts.db: npx sequelize db:create && npx sequelize db:migrate && npx sequelize db:seed:all --seeders-path seeders/prod
scripts.db:dev: npx sequelize db:create && npx sequelize db:migrate && npx sequelize db:seed:all --seeders-path seeders/dev
scripts.dn:prod: npx sequelize db:create && npx sequelize db:migrate && npx sequelize db:seed:all --seeders-path seeders/prod
scripts.db:dev:fresh: npx sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && npx sequelize db:migrate && npx sequelize db:seed:all --seeders-path seeders/dev
scripts.db:dev:fresh:last: npx sequelize db:migrate:undo && npx sequelize db:migrate && npx sequelize db:seed:all  --seeders-path seeders/dev
scripts.db:test: NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize db:create && NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize db:migrate:undo:all --env test && NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize db:migrate --env test && NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize db:seed:all $* --seeders-path seeders/test --env test
scripts.win:db:test: set NODE_ENV=test&& npx sequelize db:create && npx sequelize db:migrate:undo:all --env test && npx sequelize db:migrate --env test && npx sequelize db:seed:all --seeders-path seeders/test --env test
scripts.test: npm run build & STRESS_USERS=10 npm run db:test && npx jest --detectOpenHandles --runInBand
scripts.win:test: set STRESS_USERS=0&& npm run build && npm run win:db:test && npx jest --verbose --detectOpenHandles
scripts.test:stress: npm run build & STRESS_USERS=5000 npm run db:test && npx jest -t "stress" --verbose
scripts.win:test:stress: set STRESS_USERS=5000&& npm run build && npm run win:db:test && npx jest -t "stress" --verbose
scripts.coverage: npm run build && STRESS_USERS=50 npm test -- --coverage
scripts.win:coverage: npm run build && set STRESS_USERS=50&& npm run win:db:test && npx jest --coverage --detectOpenHandles

author: Torma Levente PÃ©ter
